title: Give your computer a boost to Microsoft Windows 11 Pro, now just $24.97
content:
Macworld

You’d be surprised how revitalized your computer can feel after an invigorating OS upgrade. Right now, you can give your PC (or even your Mac) a serious shot in the arm with a boost up to Microsoft Windows 11 Pro, now available at a fraction of its regular price.

Windows 11 Pro is designed to make your computer experience both seamlessly smooth and unerringly secure. With enhanced safety tools and improved security features, it’s a major step up for everyone from professionals to even remote workers.

With biometrics login, smart app control, and a handful of protection features, Windows has never been more secure, packing full device encryption, a device locator, and firewall network protection.

If your computer is stolen, Windows Pro 11 offers peace of mind with Bitlocker device encryption so your data stays locked unless the proper encryption key is entered.

Rated 4/5 stars on PC Magazine, Windows 11 Pro introduces a boatload of interface enhancements, including snap layouts, new desktops, and redocking that make multitasking a breeze. It’s also brimming with new artificial intelligence capabilities, from Windows Copilot for assisting with tasks like changing settings, starting playlists, summarizing documents, and more.

Always check your system requirements first to ensure your machine can run Windows 11 Pro, but at just $24.97 (reg. $199), this is the time to make the move. Make sure to secure that price by purchasing before 11:59 p.m. PT on Sun., Jan. 28.
